content: X-GN MX Concrete nails (collated) Collated nails for fastening to concrete and other base materials using the GX 120 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Nail for excellent performance on soft concrete Everyday fastening solution with cut-tip nail Applications Fastening to soft concrete Fastening to solid masonry Fastening to filled block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 2-3/8 in Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Material: Carbon steel Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 2-3/8 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 Âµm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.1 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | IBMB | For use with (tools) | GX 120 | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 226933 -
